name: ApplyVersionToAssemblies
friendlyName: Innofactor DevOps: Apply Build Version to assemblies
description: This task will extract the four part version number from the generated build number or given file and update all AssemblyInfo.cs files in the solution with this version.
author: Innofactor Sweden
helpMarkDown: This task will extract the *four part version number* from the generated {build number} or {given file} and update all AssemblyInfo.cs files in the solution with this version.

inputs.name: versionType
inputs.label: Type

options.build: Search for full version in generated build number
options.file: Search for revision in build number and append it to pattern from file

inputs.helpMarkDown: Select location where version pattern will be searched.

inputs.name: versionFile
inputs.label: File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Text file with version information. Revision number will be appended to it.

inputs.name: versionMatch
inputs.label: Match CRM SDK major and minor versions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Replace first two digits in resulting version with Microsoft Dynamics CRM SDK version found in `packages.config`
